name: MX Keys / MX Keys S

name: G915 TKL
type: Wireless mechanical gaming keyboard (low-profile GL switches)

name: Pro X / PRO X TKL
specs: TKL/full layout, hot-swappable GX switches (clicky/linear/tactile), Esports-oriented

specs: Gen-2 Analog Optical switches, adjustable actuation, rapid trigger, wireless

specs: Full/TKL layout options, Razer Mechanical switches (Green/Yellow/Orange), Chroma RGB, aluminium top plate

specs: Full-size, Cherry MX (Speed/other) switches, aluminium frame, per-key RGB, dedicated macro/media keys

specs: Cherry MX (Red/Brown/Speed) switches, full-size, per-key RGB, braided cable, media controls

name: Apex Pro
specs: OmniPoint adjustable actuation switches, advanced customization, OLED/Smart Display on some models

name: Alloy Origins
specs: HyperX mechanical switches (Aqua/Red), full aluminium body, per-key RGB, N-key rollover

name: K2
specs: 75% compact layout, Bluetooth/Wired USB-C, Mac/Windows keycaps, hot-swappable options

name: K6
specs: 65% layout, Bluetooth 5.1 / Wired USB-C, hot-swappable variants, compact footprint

name: One 2 Mini

name: Anne Pro 2
specs: 60% layout, Bluetooth 5.0 / Wired USB-C, ~1900 mAh battery, PBT keycaps, NKRO

name: VA87M (VA Series)
specs: 87-key TKL layout, Cherry MX switch options, PBT keycaps, premium build, typist focus

name: FC750R

name: 3068B
